SELECT
DATE_FORMAT(edr.drive_date, '%Y-%m-%d' ) as driveDate,
DATE_FORMAT(edr.drive_date, '%Y-%m' ) as driveDate,
sum(edr.distance_km) as totalDistanceKm, sum(edr.electricity_consumed) as totalElectricityConsumed, ROUND(sum(edr.electricity_consumed) / sum(edr.distance_km), 2) AS electricityPerKm FROM ev_drive_records edr
AND DATE_FORMAT(edr.drive_date,'%Y-%m-%d') >= #{request.timeRange[0]} AND DATE_FORMAT(edr.drive_date,'%Y-%m-%d') <= #{request.timeRange[1]}
AND DATE_FORMAT(edr.drive_date,'%Y-%m') >= #{request.timeRange[0]} AND DATE_FORMAT(edr.drive_date,'%Y-%m') <= #{request.timeRange[1]}
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(edr.drive_date,'%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(edr.drive_date,'%Y-%m-%d') asc
GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(edr.drive_date,'%Y-%m') ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(edr.drive_date,'%Y-%m') asc
